CREATE TABLE public."SupportTickets"
(
    "SupportTicketId" integer NOT NULL GENERATED BY DEFAULT AS IDENTITY ( INCREMENT 1 START 1 MINVALUE 1 MAXVALUE 2147483647 CACHE 1 ),
	"Theme" character varying(1000) COLLATE pg_catalog."default" NOT NULL,
	"Description" character varying(4000) COLLATE pg_catalog."default" NOT NULL,
	"Note" character varying(1000) COLLATE pg_catalog."default" NULL,
	"Status" integer NOT NULL,
	"EventId" integer NULL,
	"OpenDate" timestamp without time zone NOT NULL,
	"InWorkDate" timestamp without time zone NULL,
	"CloseDate" timestamp without time zone NULL,
	"NeedToClose" boolean NOT NULL,
	"UserId" text COLLATE pg_catalog."default" NOT NULL,
	"SupportEmployeeId" character varying(50) COLLATE pg_catalog."default" NULL,
	"NisidiEmployeeId" character varying(50) COLLATE pg_catalog."default" NULL,
    CONSTRAINT "PK_SupportTickets" PRIMARY KEY ("SupportTicketId"),
    CONSTRAINT "FK_Events_AspNetUsers_UserId" FOREIGN KEY ("UserId")
        REFERENCES public."AspNetUsers" ("Id") MATCH SIMPLE
        ON UPDATE NO ACTION
        ON DELETE CASCADE
)

TABLESPACE pg_default;

ALTER TABLE public."SupportTickets"
    OWNER to postgres;
-- Index: IX_Events_UserId

-- DROP INDEX public."IX_Events_UserId";

CREATE INDEX "IX_SupportTickets_UserId"
    ON public."SupportTickets" USING btree
    ("UserId" COLLATE pg_catalog."default" ASC NULLS LAST)
    TABLESPACE pg_default;
